availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Munfordville, Kentucky. Mustered in on September 13, 1862, and consolidated with the 26th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on April 1, 1864. Commander(s): Lieutenant Colonel J. F. Lauck.

ab.bibl:
Frederick H. Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion, Vol. I (Des Moines, IA: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1210.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 316.
